data_maturity_score.evidence: Focus on traditional BI/DW with Cognos and legacy ETL tools (DataStage, Informatica) suggests developing maturity. No mention of modern data stack, data quality testing, or governance tools.

data_maturity_level.evidence: Matches score of 2 - basic pipelines with some automation (ETL tools) but inconsistent modern practices.

maturity_signals.evidence: Mentions 'requirements gathering' and 'technical requirements' which imply some governance, but no modern tools or practices mentioned.

scope_creep_score.evidence: Focused on BI/DW reporting, visualization, and ETL - well-defined responsibilities without conflating with ML, DevOps, or frontend roles.

overtime_risk_score.evidence: Onsite requirement in Pune with 'relentless focus on quality' and 'root cause analysis' suggests potential for long hours, but no explicit overtime or on-call mentions.

role_clarity.evidence: Well-defined responsibilities around reporting, visualization, ETL, and Cognos administration.

overall_red_flag_score.evidence: Low risk - clear role with reasonable requirements, but limited growth signals and legacy tech stack.

reporting_structure_clarity.evidence: Mentions working with business and technical team members but no specific manager or reporting line mentioned.

manager_level_inferred.evidence: No manager title or level mentioned in job posting.

team_growth_velocity.evidence: No information about team expansion or hiring velocity.

team_composition.evidence: No details about team size or composition provided.

reporting_structure.evidence: No reporting structure specified in job posting.

cross_functional_embedded.evidence: Mentions working with business and technical team members but no indication of embedded cross-functional teams.

work_life_balance_score.evidence: Onsite requirement in Pune with no mention of PTO, flexible hours, or work-life balance policies.

growth_opportunities_score.evidence: No mention of learning budget, conferences, mentorship, or career paths. 'Continuous improvement' is vague.

tech_culture_score.evidence: Legacy tech stack (Cognos, DataStage) with no mention of modern practices like CI/CD, testing, or code reviews.

tech_culture_signals.evidence: No mention of open source, tech blogs, conference speaking, hackathons, or innovation time.

dev_practices_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of code review, CI/CD, testing, monitoring, or other development practices.

innovation_signals.evidence: Focus on maintaining and evolving existing BI/DW systems with no mention of innovation or experimentation.

tech_debt_awareness.evidence: No mention of tech debt, refactoring, or modernization efforts.

ai_integration_level.evidence: No mention of ML, AI, or GenAI in job description or requirements.

ml_tools_expected.evidence: No ML tools mentioned in job posting.

hiring_urgency.evidence: No mention of start date, urgency, or timeline in job posting.

competition_level.evidence: No application count, location competitiveness, or salary disclosure to infer competition level.

company_stage_inferred.evidence: IBM is a well-established tech company with global delivery centers.

hiring_velocity.evidence: No information about hiring pace or multiple open roles.

team_size_signals.evidence: No details about data/engineering team size provided.

funding_stage_signals.evidence: IBM is a publicly traded company.

role_creation_type.evidence: No indication if this is a new headcount, backfill, or expansion.

strength_details: Clear responsibilities focused on BI/DW reporting and ETL
Established company (IBM) with global delivery centers
Role is specifically data engineering with no scope creep
concern_details: Legacy tech stack (Cognos, DataStage) with no modern tools mentioned
No clear career growth path or learning opportunities mentioned
Location restricted to Pune, India - no visa sponsorship
Onsite requirement may imply on-call or weekend work expectations
best_fit_details: Mid-level engineers with 3+ years in BI/DW and Cognos experience
Candidates experienced with batch ETL and legacy enterprise systems
Those seeking stable roles in established tech companies
probe_details: Ask about the actual tech stack beyond Cognos and DataStage
Inquire about career progression opportunities and mentorship
Clarify expected work hours and any on-call requirements
leverage_details: Cognos Developer/Admin experience is a rare and specific requirement
Experience with IBM tools (DataStage) is a strong differentiator
summary.overall_assessment: Stable opportunity for mid-level data engineers with BI/DW experience seeking roles in established tech companies. Clear responsibilities but limited growth signals and legacy technology stack. Main trade-offs are lack of modern tools and Pune location requirement.
